view.combat

Interface CombatGUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombatGUIImpl

    public interface CombatGUI
    Interface for the main GUI of the game, the CombatGUI

                java.util.List<Skill> heroSkills)
        Initializes the CombatGUI, adding all the needed component
        Parameters:
        controllerReference -
        monsterList - list of the monsters of the current stage
        heroName - name of the current hero
        heroStats - statistics of the current hero
        heroSkills - skills usable by the current hero

        Refreshes the battle log with the least recent attack
        Parameters:
        attacker - the entity who attacks
        target - the entity being attacked
        skill - the skill used for the attack
        damage - the damage of the attack
